info.title: Numeraire SwissKnife REST API
info.description: This API is available to anyone with a Numeraire account. The `User Wallet` (`/me`) endpoints are the main access point for users.

get.description: Returns the LNURL payRequest for this LN Address (username). The returned payload contains information allowing the payer to generate an invoice. See [LUDS-06](https://github.com/lnurl/luds/blob/luds/06.md)
Returns the names known by this service given username. The returned payload contains public keys in hex format. See [NIP-05](https://github.com/nostr-protocol/nips/blob/master/05.md)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Username to query

get.description: Returns the callback response for this LN Address (username). Containing an invoice and information on how to behave upon success. See [LUDS-06](https://github.com/lnurl/luds/blob/luds/06.md)

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount in millisatoshis

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Optional comment for the recipient

key.description: API key (only returned once on creation, save it securely as it cannot be retrieved)

permissions.description: List of permissions for this API key

contact_since.description: Date of first payment to this contact

permissions.description: List of permissions for this API key

user_id.description: User ID. Will be populated with your own ID by default

is_healthy.description: Whether the system is healthy and can be used

ln_provider.description: Health of the Lightning provider service

fee_msat.description: Fees paid. Populated when a new channel is opened to receive the funds.

ln_address_id.description: Lightning Address. Populated when invoice is generated as part of the LNURL protocol

timestamp.description: Date of creation on the LN node

active.description: Active status. Inactive addresses cannot receive funds

expiry.description: Duration of expiry in seconds since creation

min_final_cltv_expiry_delta.description: The minimum number of blocks the final hop in the route should wait before allowing the payment to be claimed. This is a security measure to ensure that the payment can be settled properly

payee_pubkey.description: Public key of the node receiving the funds

payment_secret.description: A secret value included in the payment request to mitigate certain types of attacks. The payment secret must be provided by the payer when making the payment

callback.description: The URL from LN SERVICE to accept the pay request

commentAllowed.description: Optional number of characters accepted for the `comment` query parameter on subsequent callback, defaults to 0 if not provided. (no comment allowed). See <https://github.com/lnurl/luds/blob/luds/12.md>

maxSendable.description: Max amount in milli-satoshis LN SERVICE is willing to receive

metadata.description: Metadata json which must be presented as raw string here, this is required to pass signature verification at a later step

minSendable.description: Min amount in milli-satoshis LN SERVICE is willing to receive, can not be less than 1 or more than `maxSendable`

disposable.description: An optional flag to let a wallet know whether to persist the link from step 1, if null should be interpreted as true

routes.description: array with payment routes, should be left empty if no routes are to be provided

successAction.description: An optional action to be executed after successfully paying an invoice

url.description: URL for the user to open on success

description.description: Description of the invoice. Visible by the payer

wallet_id.description: User ID. Will be populated with your own ID by default

fee_msat.description: Fees paid. Populated when a new channel is opened to receive the funds

ln_address.description: Lightning Address. Populated when sending to a LN Address

oneOf.description: Success Action. Populated when sending to a LNURL or LN Address

wallet_id.description: Wallet ID. Will be populated with your own ID by default

user_id.description: User ID. Should ideally be registered in your Auth provider.

amount_msat.description: Amount in millisatoshis. Only necessary if the input does not specify an amount (empty Bolt11, LNURL or LN Address)

comment.description: Comment of the payment. Visible by the recipient for LNURL payments

input.description: Recipient. Can be a Bolt11 invoice, LNURL or LN Address. Keysend and On-chain payments not yet supported

wallet_id.description: Wallet ID. Will be populated with your own ID by default

sign_up_complete.description: Whether the admin user has been created

welcome_complete.description: Whether the welcome flow has been completed

oneOf.description: Wallet LN address. Empty if not found

user_id.description: User ID. Populated from the Authentication method,  such as JWT subject
User ID. Populated from the Authentication method,  such as JWT subject

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Some endpoints are public, but some require authentication. We provide all the required endpoints to create an account and authorize yourself.

tags.name: User Wallet
tags.description: User Wallet endpoints. Available to any authenticated user.

tags.name: Wallets
tags.description: Wallet management endpoints. Require `read:wallet` or `write:wallet` permissions.

tags.name: Invoices
tags.description: Invoice management endpoints. Require `read:transaction` or `write:transaction` permissions.

tags.name: Payments
tags.description: Payment management endpoints. Require `read:transaction` or `write:transaction` permissions.

tags.name: Lightning Addresses
tags.description: LN Address management endpoints as defined in the [protocol specification](https://lightningaddress.com/). Require `read:ln_address` or `write:ln_address` permissions.

tags.name: LNURL
tags.description: Public LNURL endpoints as defined in the [protocol specification](https://github.com/lnurl/luds). Allows any active Lightning Address to receive payments

tags.name: Nostr
tags.description: Public Nostr endpoints as defined in the [protocol specification](https://github.com/nostr-protocol/nips). Allows any Nostr client to identify a user's public keys

tags.name: Lightning Node
tags.description: LN Node management endpoints. Currently only available for `breez` Lightning provider. Require `read:ln_node` or `write:ln_node` permissions.

tags.name: API Keys
tags.description: API Key Management. Require `read:api_key` or `write:api_key` permissions.
